Title: Requires a local social services district to accept or deny an application for public assistance no later than thirty days after the date of the application; repealer
Summary: Requires a local social services district to accept or deny an application for public assistance as soon as possible but no later than thirty days after the date of the application.
LawCode: Rpld §153 sub 8, amd §§131, 22, 131-a & 158, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to applications for public assistance and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
